name: Planet Takeback
description:
A short pico8 game made for the 48 + 8 Jam #3

Humanity has moved on from Earth, claiming alien planets for their own. On one such planet, the terraforming equipment has malfunctioned and has activated its defense systems. You must now destroy it, good luck as you'll need it.

(This is a difficult boss fight, to make it easier try using the screen wrapping to your advantage)

Pilot the plane using arrow keys
Hold C to shoot
Press V to reset

Some more tips:
You can shoot enemy spawns, but they wont stop spawning : )))
Lightning is an insta-kill
